name: Dragonfaebook
description: A departure from my usual themes, this Facebook theme is based on dragonfae.  I used the same color schemes as I did with the Castlevania Timeline Edit on this.  Enjoy. Incidentally, there is also a G+ version here: http://userstyles.org/styles/92689/dragonfae-plus?r=1378447029

user.name: gjcypher
user.about: A long time ago, I was a huge fan of Myspace. This was because you could change the backgrounds by altering the html in Myspace's own settings. After Facebook got really popular and Myspace fell by the wayside, I have been searching for a way to make it easier to look at as I use it and other sites. Since I found this site, the app Stylish, and now Stylus, I have been training myself to code CSS and I would say I am very good at it. I'm not a big fan of white backgrounds and I obviously love to theme my pages. I used to mostly do Google Plus, but I also work Facebook and other sites as well. However, with closing of G+, I am only moving some of my skins to regular Google and adapting some of the rest for Youtube as I use that site more nowadays. If for some reason you find something wrong, let me know. Generally I discover issues when I stumble upon them, so if you want something improved, I'm working on it. Make sure you update, because I update frequently. One more thing. If you happen to use a junk cleaning program like CCleaner, make sure you allow the program to keep the cookies for userstyles.org. Otherwise you'll have to redownload the skin. Thank you, and enjoy! I am mostly available on Facebook under the name, GJ Cypher. However, I'm more available on Telegram @gjcypher. Message me through either or email me @ goldenjcypher@gmail.com

additional_info:
1.1 Bugfixes, made jump bar transparent
1.2 Added transparency to game banners
1.3 Color fixes for Social Fixer bar

2.11 Fixed visibility in message window
3.0 Changed background colors to gradients, allowed for Social Fixer friend tracker to appear
3.1 Added rgba filter to edit info.
3.2 Color and rgba fixes to timeline; added back timeline bar.
3.3 Color fixes.  Removed new FB logo in favor of old one
3.4 Color fixes throughout facebook
3.5 Color fixes on invite panel
3.6 Smoother design, more color fixes and extraneous borders removed.
3.7 Added new Dragon font to facebook
3.8 Bugfixes; regorganization of code; added new background to search dropdown
3.9 Major Updates to improve main page appearance, added back all but trending and facebook trademark
